metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9481 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Apache ATS 6.0.0 to 6.2.3, 7.0.0 to 7.1.9, and 8.0.0 to 8.0.6 is vulnerable to a HTTP/2 slow read attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-9481` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

trafficserver - 8.0.7+ds-1
trafficserver-experimental-plugins - 8.0.7+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.0.7+ds-1').
